"Hardcore Test Part II":
"Howdy. You been working hard? Well, I'll be the
judge of that. I've got a little test for you. I take it you
know what a time attack is? Yep, it's a race against
time. This is a really tough one over on Lilipur. See
how fast you can clear it. Your time goes in the
records, and I've got a bounty for you, too.
Not a bad deal, if I do say so myself.
*Complete the mission with an A Rank or higher
on Very Hard difficulty or above.
"

"やー、精進してるかい？
それじゃお兄さんから、ひとつ力試しの
依頼でもしちゃおうかなー。
タイムアタックって、わかるかな？
そーそー、あの走破時間を競う演習。
惑星リリーパのすごく難しいやつ。
あれをさくっと達成してきてよ。
記録も残って、私から報酬ももらえる。
至れり尽くせりだと思うけどねえ。
※ベリーハード以上、Aランク以上でクリア"
